ygData.subject: Re: quest help / armor question
ygData.msgSnippet: Elves are scrawny little beggars who are able to get away with wearing both medium and small armor. Humans, being a bit more bulky, are restricted to medium
ygData.messageBody:
Elves are scrawny little beggars who are able to get away with wearing both
medium
and small armor. Humans, being a bit more bulky, are restricted to medium
armor.






Clanretri@... on 05/05/99 08:29:07

Please respond to EverQuest@onelist.com

To: Bristlebane_EQ@onelist.com, Bristlebane_EQ_OOC@onelist.com,
eq@onelist.com, eq-list@onelist.com, eq-quest@onelist.com,
eqpaladin@onelist.com, eq_masters@onelist.com,
eq_paladins@onelist.com, everquest@onelist.com, lifebanez@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: Michael Wyatt/AU/AMP)
Subject: [EverQuest] quest help / armor question




From: Clanretri@...

Hail all!

I have a question about the Paladin quest in Nfreeport. It's the one
about
the tokens of courage and generosity, anyone know where i can find those
tokens he did not give any hints whatsoever:(
Also the dwarven ringmail tunic, i understand that's it's for small
races
only? but I seen a couple of high-elves wearing them, so is it possible for
human to wear it as well?
Any help will be greatly appreciated, thanx!


Bobaliya
